description.en:
We are established by volunteers all around the world and are working all remotely,
Our main goals are to establish an independent chain different from Bitcoin. No Energy Wasting needed to create an Ecosystem.

Ai stands for Artificial Intelligence The Future is of course Artificial Intelligence that is why we will be always active in developing Artificial Intelligence Solutions to get the best out of our products.

Pi stands for The Number Phi or to Golden Ratio the symbol of excellence.
Our developers are busy with developing several Applications the priority is off course the Decentralized Banking App.

Shortly AiPiChain 
-Use Mobile App & Earn Rewards
-Send & Receive Money Instantly Globally
-Swap Cryptocurrencies
-Pay globally Contactless with our mobile App trough NFC
